org.conqat.lib.commons.xml

Class ElementEnumSaxHandler.TextElementHandler<ELEMENT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.xml.ElementEnumSaxHandler.ElementHandler<ELEMENT>
      • org.conqat.lib.commons.xml.ElementEnumSaxHandler.TextElementHandler<ELEMENT>
  • Enclosing class:
    ElementEnumSaxHandler<ELEMENT extends java.lang.Enum<ELEMENT> & ElementEnumSaxHandler.IElementEnum<ELEMENT>>

    public static class ElementEnumSaxHandler.TextElementHandler<ELEMENT>
extends ElementEnumSaxHandler.ElementHandler<ELEMENT>
    Handler for text callbacks in addition to the callbacks defined in ElementEnumSaxHandler.ElementHandler.

    As capturing text may reduce performance, please consider using ElementEnumSaxHandler.ElementHandler if not interested in text.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextElementHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onText(ELEMENT element, java.lang.String text)
      Will be called exactly once for an element with all the text that has occurred in the XML between the start element and end element callback.

      • Methods inherited from class org.conqat.lib.commons.xml.ElementEnumSaxHandler.ElementHandler

        onEndElement, onStartElement

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextElementHandler

        public TextElementHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • onText

        public void onText(ELEMENT element,
                   java.lang.String text)
            throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Will be called exactly once for an element with all the text that has occurred in the XML between the start element and end element callback. Text of descendant elements is also captured unless a ElementEnumSaxHandler.TextElementHandler for these elements is registered.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
